title: Problem saving refined labels.
body:
*Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version*
I am using Ubuntu 16.04 and DeepLabCut version 2.0.6.2

*Please state your operating system, env, and which version of DeepLabCut you are using.*
Ubuntu 16.04 with provided Anaconda Env & DeepLabCut 2.0.6.2

*Please complete the following information about your system:*

OS: Ubuntu 16.04
DeepLabCut Version 2.0.6.2
Browser Firefox

*Describe the problem*
My refined labels do not appear to be saving correctly. When I refine labels and then save and go to check my labels, certain frames do not appear to be updating. About 85% of them save as expected, but the remaining 15% do not save with the refinements I made. Some of these frames appear to be labeled identically to the labels I placed on other frames from a different video in the training dataset, as shown in the images below. I'm uncertain how to reproduce the problem, as it only happens about 15% of the time but it interferes with performance.  

![img002](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37850800/61747803-85314400-ad53-11e9-8303-bdbbe8267b1d.png)
This frame is clearly labeled as I have labeled a different frame. I have refined the labels on this particular frame, saved it, and gone to check the labels and it still has not updated, whereas others I refined have updated, as shown in the following image (from the same video). This problem has persisted for several particular frames across several iterations of this project.
![img007](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37850800/61747852-af830180-ad53-11e9-88d2-456c480433c2.png)
